sqls.sql: SELECT tools_no, tools_used_qty, tools_eff, tools_is_enable, tools_constrain_aps, wkt_before_c, wkt_after_c, wkt_produce_c, qty_produce_c, wkt_worker_c, wkt_worker_num_c, wkt_before_b, wkt_after_b, wkt_produce_b, qty_produce_b, wkt_worker_b, wkt_worker_num_b, wkt_before_a, wkt_after_a, wkt_produce_a, qty_produce_a, wkt_worker_a, wkt_worker_num_a, pd_rmb_tools_rmk01, pd_rmb_tools_rmk02, pd_rmb_tools_rmk03, pd_rmb_tools_rmk04, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user_no, upd_user, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM pd_rmb_tools WHERE unode = @unode;
